column1: The build was quick and easy. It took me

Overall this is a nice Mixel. The spikes really add to it and the tail is really cool (hence the name). He has eight legs (six with black spikes and two with silver). His head rotates 360 degrees. The has two different connecting points that allow for great mobility and movement. Overall this is a really good Mixel. I recommend it for anybody who is a fan of the Mixels series. If you aren'
